languages.text: "Судя по телеметрии, перед нами останки имперского мира. Печальное зрелище. Едва ли мы когда-нибудь узнаем, какое именно несчастье его настигло".

traits.locale_text: "Судя по телеметрии, перед нами останки имперского мира. Печальное зрелище. Едва ли мы когда-нибудь узнаем, какое именно несчастье его настигло".

languages.text: "The telemetry indicates that these are the remnants of an Imperial world. A sorry sight. It is unlikely we will ever learn what catastrophe took place here."
languages.original_text: "Судя по телеметрии, перед нами останки имперского мира. Печальное зрелище. Едва ли мы когда-нибудь узнаем, какое именно несчастье его настигло".

traits.locale_text: "The telemetry indicates that these are the remnants of an Imperial world. A sorry sight. It is unlikely we will ever learn what catastrophe took place here."
"The telemetry indicates that these are the remnants of an Imperial world. A sorry sight. It is unlikely we will ever learn what catastrophe took place here."
"The telemetry indicates that these are the remnants of an Imperial world. A sorry sight. It is unlikely we will ever learn what catastrophe took place here."
"The telemetry indicates that these are the remnants of an Imperial world. A sorry sight. It is unlikely we will ever learn what catastrophe took place here."

languages.text: « La télémétrie indique qu'il s'agit des vestiges d'un monde impérial. Un bien triste spectacle. Je doute que nous sachions un jour quelle catastrophe a frappé cette planète. »
languages.original_text: "The telemetry indicates that these are the remnants of an Imperial world. A sorry sight. It is unlikely we will ever learn what catastrophe took place here."

traits.locale_text: « La télémétrie indique qu'il s'agit des vestiges d'un monde impérial. Un bien triste spectacle. Je doute que nous sachions un jour quelle catastrophe a frappé cette planète. »

languages.text: “遥测数据显示，这些是帝国世界的遗迹。真是令人难过的景象。可惜，我们永远不会知道，这里曾经发生过怎样的灾难。”
languages.original_text: "The telemetry indicates that these are the remnants of an Imperial world. A sorry sight. It is unlikely we will ever learn what catastrophe took place here."

traits.locale_text: “遥测数据显示，这些是帝国世界的遗迹。真是令人难过的景象。可惜，我们永远不会知道，这里曾经发生过怎样的灾难。”

languages.text: 「テレメトリーによると、これはインペリアルワールドの残骸だ。残念な光景だな。ここでどのような大惨事が起こったのか知ることはできそうもない」
languages.original_text: "The telemetry indicates that these are the remnants of an Imperial world. A sorry sight. It is unlikely we will ever learn what catastrophe took place here."

traits.locale_text: 「テレメトリーによると、これはインペリアルワールドの残骸だ。残念な光景だな。ここでどのような大惨事が起こったのか知ることはできそうもない」

languages.text: "Die Telemetrie deutet darauf hin, dass dies die Überreste einer imperialen Welt sind. Ein trauriger Anblick. Wir werden wohl nie erfahren, welche Katastrophe hier stattgefunden hat."
languages.original_text: "The telemetry indicates that these are the remnants of an Imperial world. A sorry sight. It is unlikely we will ever learn what catastrophe took place here."

traits.locale_text: "Die Telemetrie deutet darauf hin, dass dies die Überreste einer imperialen Welt sind. Ein trauriger Anblick. Wir werden wohl nie erfahren, welche Katastrophe hier stattgefunden hat."

languages.text: «La telemetría indica que estos son los restos de un mundo Imperial. Es un espectáculo lamentable. Dudo que lleguemos a saber qué clase de catástrofe tuvo lugar».
languages.original_text: "The telemetry indicates that these are the remnants of an Imperial world. A sorry sight. It is unlikely we will ever learn what catastrophe took place here."

traits.locale_text: «La telemetría indica que estos son los restos de un mundo Imperial. Es un espectáculo lamentable. Dudo que lleguemos a saber qué clase de catástrofe tuvo lugar».

languages.text: "Telemetri, bunun bir İmparatorluk dünyasının kalıntıları olduğunu gösteriyor. Üzücü bir manzara. Burada ne tür bir felaketin meydana geldiğini muhtemelen asla öğrenemeyeceğiz."
languages.original_text: "The telemetry indicates that these are the remnants of an Imperial world. A sorry sight. It is unlikely we will ever learn what catastrophe took place here."
